title: Sans serif and pretty simple font
author: 123stbn

comments.content: It could be **[Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160923/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Futura/fonts/)** with a horizontal/vertical mirrored /s - The /s matches probably better the Adobe, Linotype or URW++ version of Futura than Bitstream's
